levels.name: Files & Navigation (mkdir, touch, echo, pwd, ls)
levels.clue: Create directory 'lab1', create file lab1/start.txt, and write 'begin' into it.
hints: Create a directory with mkdir. Use touch to create files. Use echo with > to write.

levels.name: Copy & Move (cp, mv, rm)
levels.clue: Copy lab1/start.txt to lab1/copy.txt, rename to lab1/moved.txt, and remove lab1/start.txt.
hints: Use cp to copy, mv to rename/move, rm to remove files.

levels.name: Viewing & Searching (cat, tail, grep, find, pipes)
levels.clue: Create messages.txt containing the word 'secret' on a line, then grep that line.
hints: Use grep to search text. Pipes | and > redirects are allowed. Use find to locate files.

levels.name: Links & Disk (ln, du, df)
levels.clue: Create symlink lab1/link_to_moved -> lab1/moved.txt and run du -h lab1.
hints: Create symbolic links with ln -s. Check sizes with du -h and filesystem with df -h.

levels.name: Compress & Find (zip/unzip/find)
levels.clue: Zip the lab1 directory into lab1.zip, remove lab1, and list files inside the zip.
hints: Use zip -r to create an archive, unzip -l to list its contents, find to search files.
